Presente

English
I speak, am speaking
yo
hablo
tú
hablas

habláis

Negativo

English
Don't speak!
yo
tú
no hables
Ud./él/ella
no hable
nosotros, -as

no habléis
Uds./ellos/ellas
no hablen

25 Estas cosas os he hablado estando con vosotros.
33 Estas cosas os he hablado, para que en mÃ­ tengÃ¡is paz.
3 Ya vosotros sois limpios por la palabra que os he hablado.
6 Antes, porque os he hablado estas cosas, tristeza ha henchido vuestro corazÃ³n.
11 Estas cosas os he hablado, para que mi gozo estÃ© en vosotros, y vuestro gozo sea cumplido.
23 RespondiÃ³le JesÃºs: Si he hablado mal, da testimonio del mal: y si bien, Â¿por quÃ© me hieres?
40 Empero ahora procurÃ¡is matarme, hombre que os he hablado la verdad, la cual he oÃ­do de Dios: no hizo esto Abraham.
63 El espÃ­ritu es el que da vida; la carne nada aprovecha: las palabras que yo os he hablado, son espÃ­ritu y son vida.
48 El que me desecha, y no recibe mis palabras, tiene quien le juzgue: la palabra que he hablado, ella le juzgarÃ¡ en el dÃ­a postrero.
25 Estas cosas os he hablado en proverbios: la hora viene cuando ya no os hablarÃ© por proverbios, pero claramente os anunciarÃ© del Padre.
49 Porque yo no he hablado de mÃ­ mismo: mas el Padre que me enviÃ³, Ã©l me diÃ³ mandamiento de lo que he de decir, y de lo que he de hablar.
Â¿Tiene su merced noticia de alguna zorra que sepa tantas picardÃ­as como nosotros?--Repito, mi General, que, no sÃ³lo he visto Ã¡ _ParrÃ³n_, sino que he hablado con Ã©l.
20 JesÃºs le respondiÃ³: Yo manifiestamente he hablado al mundo: yo siempre he enseÃ±ado en la sinagoga y en el templo, donde se juntan todos los JudÃ­os, y nada he hablado en oculto.

ha hablado
Otros decÃ­an: Angel le ha hablado.
Al dÃ­a siguiente 60 fue a su padre y le dijo: --SeÃ±or padre, tal vez me he casado con un zapatero porque anoche en sueÃ±os ha hablado de sus hormas y de su lesna.
Se ha hablado tanto de la resistencia que ponen los exportadores norteamericanos para imitar los procedimientos comerciales europeos, que me interesa sobremanera saber en quÃ© consisten estos Ãºltimos.

46 Los ministriles respondieron: Nunca ha hablado hombre asÃ­ como este hombre.
--Recientemente se ha hablado del petrÃ³leo argentino en los cÃ­rculos financieros de Nueva York.

Â¿De quÃ© hemos hablado?

habéis hablado

han hablado
Lo bien que[248] comprendÃ­a Castelar las condiciones americanas se ve por el trozo de elocuencia que sigue: /F HEROÃSMO AMERICANO EN LA ABOLICIÃ“N DE LA ESCLAVITUD F/ Los Estados Unidos han invocado el Dios de la 5 libertad; han aceptado la guerra como un gran castigo por el pecado nacional de la esclavitud; han hablado a los dueÃ±os de esclavos en el sublime lenguaje de los antiguos profetas; se han desposeÃ­do de sus bienes para romper sus ergÃ¡stulas; han dado su pura sangre sajona, 10 su blanca piel por la dignidad y por la libertad de aquellos negros, menos estimados que los perros; han ensangrentado el MisisipÃ­; han cubierto de ruinas las llanuras y las montaÃ±as de Virginia; han inmolado en la cruzada de la dignidad y de la igualdad humanas un 15 millÃ³n de hombres que, las madres americanas, inclinadas las frentes sobre el Evangelio, han visto morir en la tierra, pero renacer en el cielo; y sobre las ruinas de Richmond, entre el choque de dos mundos, se han derretido las cadenas de tres millones de esclavos y se 20 ha levantado, como el epÃ­logo de un gran poema, que estÃ¡ aguardando el genio de Homero aumentado por el genio del Dante, rejuvenecidos ambos por la savia del Nuevo Mundo; se ha levantado como epÃ­logo de este poema el sacrificio de Lincoln, de ese segundo Cristo de 25 los negros.

hubieras comido _You might have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiera comido _He, she might have eaten, etc._ usted hubiera comido _You might have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©ramos comido _We might have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hubierais comido _You might have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hubieran comido _They might have eaten, etc._ ustedes hubieran comido _You might have eaten, etc._ FUTURO PERFECTO habré hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have =aseis= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =asen= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =asen= _You might speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo habl =ara= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiese hablado _He, she might have spoken, etc._ usted hubiese hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos hablado _We might have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubiesen hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ (familiar singular) _eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =e= _He, she eats, etc._ usted com =e= _You_ (polite singular) _eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =emos= _We eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã©is= _You_ (familiar plural) _eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =en= _They eat, etc._ ustedes com =en= _You_ (polite plural) _eat, etc._ IMPERFECTO yo com =Ã­a= _I was eating, used to eat, ate._ tÃº com =Ã­as= _You_ (familiar singular) _were eating, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =Ã­a= _He, she was eating, etc._ usted com =Ã­a= _You_ (polite singular) _were eating, etc._ nosotros (as) com =Ã­amos= _We were eating, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã­ais= _You_ (familiar plural) _were eating, etc._ ellos, ellas com =Ã­an= _They were eating, etc._ ustedes com =Ã­an= _You_ (polite plural) _were eating, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO yo com =Ã­= _I ate, did eat._ tÃº com =iste= _You ate, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =iÃ³= _He, she ate, etc._ usted com =iÃ³= _You ate, etc._ nosotros (as) com =imos= _We ate, etc._ vosotros (as) com =isteis= _You she will eat, etc._ usted comer =Ã¡= _You will eat, etc._ nosotros (as) comer =emos= _We shall eat, etc._ vosotros (as) comer =Ã©is= _You will eat, etc._ ellos, ellas comer =Ã¡n= _They will eat, etc._ COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ habremos hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido habréis hablado

habrán hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã©is= _You will speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã¡n= _They will speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã¡n= _You will speak._ CONDICIONAL yo hablar =Ã­a= _I should or would speak, be speaking._ tÃº hablar =Ã­as= _You would speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã­a= _He, she would speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã­a= _You would speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =Ã­amos= _We should or would speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã­ais= _You would speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã­an= _They would speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã­an= _You would speak, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo habl =e= _I may speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =es= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =e= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =e= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =emos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =Ã©is= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =en= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =en= _You may speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo habl =ase= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =ases= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ase= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ase= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡semos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =aseis= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =asen= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =asen= _You might speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo habl =ara= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =aras= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ara= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ara= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡ramos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =arais= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aran= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aran= _You might speak, etc._ FUTURO yo habl =are= _I may speak, be speaking._[375] tÃº habl =ares= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =are= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =are= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡remos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =areis= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiese hablado _He, she might have spoken, etc._ usted hubiese hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos hablado _We might have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubiesen hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ --Todo eso estÃ¡ muy bueno,[41]--dijo sonriendo el seÃ±or Matienzo, que hasta entonces no habÃ­a hablado;--pero de nada valdrÃ­a[42] el que los Estados Unidos poseyeran las fuentes de abastecimiento de sus mercados si al mismo tiempo no dispusieran de una marina mercante para el transporte de los productos.

COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas han comido _They have eaten, etc._ ustedes han comido _You have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a comido _I had eaten, had been eating._ tÃº habÃ­as comido _You had eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido había hablado

hubieras comido _You might have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiera comido _He, she might have eaten, etc._ usted hubiera comido _You might have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©ramos comido _We might have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hubierais comido _You might have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hubieran comido _They might have eaten, etc._ ustedes hubieran comido _You might have eaten, etc._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo hubiere comido _I may have eaten, been eating._[381] tÃº hubieres comido _You may have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiere comido _He, she may have eaten, etc._ usted hubiere comido _You may have eaten, comido _You may have eaten, etc._ =Tercera ConjugaciÃ³n= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO PARTICIPIO PASIVO =vivir=, _to live_ =viviendo=, _living_ =vivido=, _lived_ =TIEMPOS SIMPLES= =Modo Indicativo= PRESENTE yo --Todo eso estÃ¡ muy bueno,[41]--dijo sonriendo el seÃ±or Matienzo, que hasta entonces no habÃ­a hablado;--pero de nada valdrÃ­a[42] el que los Estados Unidos poseyeran las fuentes de abastecimiento de sus mercados si al mismo tiempo no dispusieran de una marina mercante para el transporte de los productos.

habíamos hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) (as) habl =Ã©is= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =en= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =en= _You may speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo habl =ase= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =ases= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ase= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ase= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡semos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl tÃº habl =aras= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ara= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ara= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡ramos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =arais= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aran= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aran= _You might speak, etc._ FUTURO yo habl =are= _I may speak, be speaking._[375] tÃº habl =ares= _You etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiese hablado _He, she might have spoken, etc._ usted hubiese hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos hablado _We might have hube hablado

hubiste hablado

vivir =Ã©is= _You will live, etc._ ellos, ellas vivir =Ã¡n= _They will live, etc._ ustedes vivir =Ã¡n= _You will live, etc._ CONDICIONAL yo vivir =Ã­a= _I should or would live, be living._[374] tÃº vivir =Ã­as= _You would live, etc._ Ã©l, ella vivir =Ã­a= _He, she would live, etc._ usted vivir =Ã­a= _You would live, etc._ nosotros (as) vivir =Ã­amos= _We should or would live, etc._ vosotros (as) vivir =Ã­ais= _You would live, etc._ ellos, ellas vivir =Ã­an= _They would live, etc._ ustedes vivir =Ã­an= _You would live, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo viv =a= _I may live, be living._[382] tÃº viv =as= _You may live, etc._ Ã©l, ella viv =a= _He, she may live, etc._ usted viv =a= _You may live, etc._ nosotros (as) viv =amos= _We may live, etc._ vosotros (as) viv =Ã¡is= _You may live, etc._ ellos, ellas viv =an= _They may live, etc._ ustedes viv =an= _You may live, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo viv =iese= _I might live, be living_.[374] tÃº viv =ieses= _You might live, etc_.

hubo hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã©is= _You will speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã¡n= _They will speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã¡n= _You will speak._ CONDICIONAL yo hablar =Ã­a= _I should or would speak, be speaking._ tÃº hablar =Ã­as= _You would speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã­a= _He, she would speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã­a= _You would speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =Ã­amos= _We should or would speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã­ais= _You would speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã­an= _They would speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã­an= _You would speak, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo habl =e= _I may speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =es= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =e= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =e= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =emos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =Ã©is= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =en= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =en= _You may speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo habl =ase= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =ases= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ase= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ase= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡semos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =aseis= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =asen= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =asen= _You might speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo habl =ara= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =aras= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ara= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ara= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡ramos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =arais= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aran= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aran= _You might speak, etc._ FUTURO yo habl =are= _I may speak, be speaking._[375] tÃº habl =ares= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =are= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =are= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡remos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =areis= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses vosotros (as) com =Ã­ais= _You_ (familiar plural) _were eating, etc._ ellos, ellas com =Ã­an= _They were eating, etc._ ustedes com =Ã­an= _You_ (polite plural) _were eating, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO yo com COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas han comido _They have eaten, etc._ ustedes han comido _You have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a comido _I had eaten, had been eating._ tÃº habÃ­as comido _You had eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a comido _He, she had eaten, etc._ usted habÃ­a comido _You had eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos comido _We had eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais comido _You had eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido hubieron hablado

yo hubiere comido _I may have eaten, been eating._[381] tÃº hubieres comido _You may have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiere comido _He, she may have eaten, etc._ usted hubiere comido _You may have eaten, comido _You may have eaten, etc._ =Tercera ConjugaciÃ³n= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO PARTICIPIO PASIVO =vivir=, _to live_ =viviendo=, _living_ =vivido=, _lived_ =TIEMPOS SIMPLES= =Modo Indicativo= PRESENTE yo habría hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã©is= _You will speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã¡n= _They will speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã¡n= _You will speak._ CONDICIONAL yo hablar =Ã­a= _I should or would speak, be speaking._ tÃº hablar =Ã­as= _You would speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã­a= _He, she would speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã­a= _You would speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =Ã­amos= _We should or would speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã­ais= _You would speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã­an= _They would speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã­an= _You would speak, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo habl =e= _I may speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =es= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =e= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =e= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =emos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =Ã©is= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =en= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =en= _You may speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo habl =ase= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =ases= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ase= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ase= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡semos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =aseis= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =asen= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =asen= _You might speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo habl =ara= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) tÃº habl =ases= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ase= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ase= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡semos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl tÃº habl =aras= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ara= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ara= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡ramos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =arais= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aran= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aran= _You might speak, etc._ FUTURO yo habl =are= _I may speak, be speaking._[375] tÃº habl =ares= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =are= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =are= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡remos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =areis= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses habríamos hablado

hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido _You would have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ­a comido _He, she would have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ­a comido _You would have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos comido _We should or would have eaten, habríais hablado

hables

hablemos
No hablemos de[17] golosinas hechas con maÃ­z, pues son infinitas.
[17] =No hablemos de ...=, _We would better not speak of ..._.

hablara
exclamÃ³ GarcÃ©s, en cuanto Ã¡ eso estad segura que como yo la topase Ã¡ tiro de ballesta, aunque me hiciese mÃ¡s monos que un juglar, aunque me hablara, no ya en romance, sino en latÃ­n como el abad de Munilla,[1] no se iba[2] sin un arpÃ³n en el cuerpo.
La prolongada espera, llevadera al principio, resultÃ³ insoportable al fin; asÃ­ es que los viajeros aburridos y hambrientos, dejando sus asientos, se apearon y fueron en busca de alguna fonda o posada donde se 5 hablara el inglÃ©s, lo cual es inÃºtil decir que no hallaron, pues en La Mancha el saber inglÃ©s es una _rara avis_.[166] Â¡QuÃ© habÃ­an de encontrar en un pueblucho de La Mancha!

hablara
exclamÃ³ GarcÃ©s, en cuanto Ã¡ eso estad segura que como yo la topase Ã¡ tiro de ballesta, aunque me hiciese mÃ¡s monos que un juglar, aunque me hablara, no ya en romance, sino en latÃ­n como el abad de Munilla,[1] no se iba[2] sin un arpÃ³n en el cuerpo.
La prolongada espera, llevadera al principio, resultÃ³ insoportable al fin; asÃ­ es que los viajeros aburridos y hambrientos, dejando sus asientos, se apearon y fueron en busca de alguna fonda o posada donde se 5 hablara el inglÃ©s, lo cual es inÃºtil decir que no hallaron, pues en La Mancha el saber inglÃ©s es una _rara avis_.[166] Â¡QuÃ© habÃ­an de encontrar en un pueblucho de La Mancha!

etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiese hablado _He, she might have spoken, etc._ usted hubiese hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos hablado _We might have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubiesen hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ hubieran hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubieran hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo hubiere hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[377] tÃº hubieres hablado haya hablado

ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido hayamos hablado

hayáis hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã©is= _You will speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã¡n= _They will speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã¡n= _You will speak._ CONDICIONAL yo hablar =Ã­a= _I should or would speak, be speaking._ tÃº hablar =Ã­as= _You would speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã­a= _He, she would speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã­a= _You would speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =Ã­amos= _We should or would speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã­ais= _You would speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã­an= _They would speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã­an= _You would speak, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo habl =e= _I may speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =es= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =e= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =e= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =emos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =Ã©is= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =en= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =en= _You may speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo habl =ase= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =ases= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ase= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ase= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡semos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =aseis= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =asen= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =asen= _You might speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo habl =ara= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =aras= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ara= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ara= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡ramos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =arais= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aran= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aran= _You might speak, etc._ FUTURO yo habl =are= _I may speak, be speaking._[375] tÃº habl =ares= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =are= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =are= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡remos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =areis= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubiesen hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiere hablado

COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido hubieres hablado

hubiere hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã­as= _You would speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã­a= _He, she would speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã­a= _You would speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =Ã­amos= _We should or would speak, etc._ INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have =arais= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aran= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aran= _You might speak, etc._ FUTURO yo habl =are= _I may speak, be speaking._[375] tÃº habl =ares= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =are= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =are= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡remos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =areis= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiese hablado _He, she might have spoken, etc._ usted hubiese hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos hablado _We might have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubiesen hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ INFINITIVO GERUNDIO PARTICIPIO PASIVO =comer=, _to eat_ =comiendo=, _eating_ =comido=, _eaten_ =TIEMPOS SIMPLES= =Modo Indicativo= PRESENTE yo com =o= _I eat, am eating, do eat._ tÃº com =es= _You_ (familiar singular) _eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =e= _He, she eats, etc._ usted com =e= _You_ (polite singular) _eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =emos= _We eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã©is= _You_ (familiar plural) _eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =en= _They eat, etc._ ustedes com =en= _You_ (polite plural) _eat, etc._ IMPERFECTO yo com =Ã­a= _I was eating, used to eat, ate._ tÃº com =Ã­as= _You_ (familiar singular) _were eating, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =Ã­a= _He, she was eating, etc._ usted com =Ã­a= _You_ (polite singular) _were eating, etc._ nosotros (as) com =Ã­amos= _We were eating, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã­ais= _You_ (familiar plural) _were eating, etc._ ellos, ellas com =Ã­an= _They were eating, etc._ ustedes com =Ã­an= _You_ (polite plural) _were eating, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO yo com =Ã­= _I ate, did eat._ tÃº com =iste= _You ate, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =iÃ³= _He, she ate, etc._ usted com =iÃ³= _You ate, etc._ nosotros (as) com =imos= _We ate, etc._ vosotros (as) com =isteis= _You ate, etc._ ellos, ellas com =ieron= _They ate, etc._ ustedes com =ieron= _You ate, etc._ FUTURO yo comer =Ã©= _I shall eat, be eating._ tÃº comer =Ã¡s= _You will eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella comer =Ã¡= _He, she will eat, etc._ usted comer =Ã¡= _You will eat, etc._ nosotros (as) comer =emos= _We shall eat, etc._ vosotros (as) comer =Ã©is= _You will eat, etc._ ellos, ellas comer =Ã¡n= _They will eat, etc._ ustedes comer =Ã¡n= _You will eat, etc._ CONDICIONAL yo comer =Ã­a= _I should or would eat, be eating._ tÃº comer =Ã­as= _You would eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella comer =Ã­a= _He, she would eat, etc._ usted comer =Ã­a= _You would eat, etc._ nosotros (as) comer =Ã­amos= _We should or would eat, etc._ vosotros (as) comer =Ã­ais= _You would eat, etc._ ellos, ellas comer =Ã­an= _They would eat, etc._ ustedes comer =Ã­an= _You would eat, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo com =a= _I may eat, be eating._[378] tÃº com =as= _You may eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella, com =a= _He, she may eat, etc._ usted com =a= _You may eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =amos= _We may eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã¡is= _You may eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =an= _They may eat, etc._ ustedes com =an= _You may eat, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo com =iese= _I might eat, be eating._[374] tÃº com =ieses= _You might eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =iese= _He, she might eat, etc._ usted com =iese= _You might eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =iÃ©semos= _We might eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =ieseis= _You might eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =iesen= _They might eat, etc._ ustedes com =iesen= _You might eat, etc._ IMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo com =iera= _I might eat, be eating._[374] tÃº com =ieras= _You might eat, etc._ Ã©1, ella com =iera= _He, she might eat, etc._ usted com =iera= _You might eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =iÃ©ramos= _We might eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =ierais= _You might eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =ieran= _They might eat, etc._ ustedes com =ieran= _You might eat, etc._ FUTURO yo com =iere= _I may eat, be eating._[379] tÃº com =ieres= _You may eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =iere= _He, she may eat, etc._ usted com =iere= _You may eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =iÃ©remos= _We may eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =iereis= _You may eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =ieren= _They may eat, etc._ ustedes com =ieren= _You may eat, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= come (tÃº) _eat_ (_thou_) comed (vosotros) _eat_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas han comido _They have eaten, etc._ ustedes han comido _You have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a comido _I had eaten, had been eating._ tÃº habÃ­as comido _You had eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a comido _He, she had eaten, etc._ usted habÃ­a comido _You had eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos comido _We had eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais comido _You had eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido _You would have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ­a comido _He, she would have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ­a comido _You would have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos comido _We should or would have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais comido _You would have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an comido _They would have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an comido _You would have eaten, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya comido _I may have eaten, been eating._[380] tÃº hayas comido _You may have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya comido _He, she may have eaten, etc._ usted haya comido _You may have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos comido _We may have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is comido _You may have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan comido _They may have eaten, etc._ ustedes hayan comido _You may have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese comido _I might have eaten, been eating._[374] tÃº hubieses comido _You might have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiese comido _He, she might have eaten, etc._ usted hubiese comido _You might have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos comido _We might have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis comido _You might have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen comido _They might have eaten, etc._ ustedes hubiesen comido _You might have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo hubiera comido _I might have eaten, been eating._[374] tÃº hubieras comido _You might have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiera comido _He, she might have eaten, etc._ usted hubiera comido _You might have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©ramos comido _We might have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hubierais comido _You might have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hubieran comido _They might have eaten, etc._ ustedes hubieran comido _You might have eaten, etc._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo hubiere comido _I may have eaten, been eating._[381] tÃº hubieres comido _You may have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiere comido _He, she may have eaten, etc._ usted hubiere comido _You may have eaten, comido _You may have eaten, etc._ =Tercera ConjugaciÃ³n= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO PARTICIPIO PASIVO =vivir=, _to live_ =viviendo=, _living_ =vivido=, _lived_ =TIEMPOS SIMPLES= =Modo Indicativo= PRESENTE yo hubieren hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido _You would have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ­a comido _He, she would have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ­a comido _You would have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos comido _We should or would have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais comido _You would have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an comido _They would have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an comido _You would have eaten, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= hubiera hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) tÃº viv =as= _You may live, etc._ Ã©l, ella viv =a= _He, she may live, etc._ usted viv =a= _You may live, etc._ nosotros (as) viv =amos= _We may live, etc._ vosotros (as) viv =Ã¡is= _You may live, etc._ ellos, ellas viv =an= _They may live, etc._ ustedes viv =an= _You may live, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo viv =iese= _I might live, be living_.[374] tÃº viv =ieses= _You might live, etc_.
22 Si no hubiera venido, ni les hubiera hablado, no tendrÃ­an pecado, mas ahora no tienen excusa de su pecado.

hubieras hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã©is= _You will speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã¡n= _They will speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã¡n= _You will speak._ CONDICIONAL yo hablar =Ã­a= _I should or would speak, be speaking._ tÃº hablar =Ã­as= _You would speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã­a= _He, she would speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã­a= _You would speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =Ã­amos= _We should or would speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã­ais= _You would speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã­an= _They would speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã­an= _You would speak, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo habl =e= _I may INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she 22 Si no hubiera venido, ni les hubiera hablado, no tendrÃ­an pecado, mas ahora no tienen excusa de su pecado.

hubiéramos hablado
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas han comido _They have eaten, etc._ ustedes han comido _You have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a comido _I had eaten, had been eating._ tÃº habÃ­as comido _You had eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido hubierais hablado

II.--LAS CASAS DE COMERCIO[1] _Adjectives; =cada= and =todo=; =Business Vocabulary= (except =Banking=)_ --Se habla mucho en estos dÃ­as[2] de la gran prosperidad de los negocios[3] en la AmÃ©rica latina.

Ã‰ste es quizÃ¡s el mÃ¡s importante de todos ellos, por tener gramÃ¡tica, literatura y teatro, y se habla en el principado de CataluÃ±a que lo componen 15 las provincias de Tarragona, Barcelona, LÃ©rida y Gerona.
Ustedes agrupan a todos los paÃ­ses que quedan al sur del RÃ­o Bravo del Norte (RÃ­o Grande) bajo un solo nombre; el de AmÃ©rica latina, o por lo menos el de AmÃ©rica espaÃ±ola cuando excluyen de la cuenta al Brasil que habla otra lengua y al que tal vez atribuyen tradiciones diferentes.
Se hace esfuerzos por conservar las formas puras y el significado propio de las palabras; pero cuando las voces nuevas o alteradas en su acepciÃ³n responden a diferencias en el ambiente y las costumbres, se muestra el mismo celo por consagrar su significado y arraigarlas en el habla popular.
No obstante de que en todas las escuelas y actos oficiales se usa el espaÃ±ol, la gente habla dialectos y aÃºn el espaÃ±ol errÃ³neamente, asÃ­ vemos que los andaluces 25 que ocupan el sur de EspaÃ±a, llamado AndalucÃ­a, hablan ceceoso, o sea pronunciando las mÃ¡s de las _eses, ces_ y todas las _ces, eses_.
El tÃ­o Fulano recobrÃ³ su sangre frÃ­a, y expuso: --Usted es quien ha de ver lo que habla; porque si no prueba, y no podrÃ¡ probar, su denuncia, lo llevarÃ© Ã¡ la cÃ¡rcel por calumniador.--Estas calabazas eran mÃ­as; yo las he criado, como todas las que he traÃ­do este aÃ±o Ã¡ CÃ¡diz, en mi huerta, y nadie podrÃ¡ probarme lo contrario.
VARIANT: =Abunda en.= 9.--LA CALANDRIA: EL RUISEÃ‘OR DE AMÃ‰RICA Uno de los pÃ¡jaros americanos que por la hermosura de su canto ha arrebatado la admiraciÃ³n del mundo antiguo, denominado por los naturalistas, _mimus_ o burlÃ³n y polÃ­gloto (que habla muchas lenguas), ha recibido entre nosotros el nombre inadecuado de calandria, siendo asÃ­ que ni aun[1] pertenece al gÃ©nero de esta alondra, sino al de los mirlos.
AsÃ­ para expresar que un hombre es valiente, dice Ã©l: Â«es como las armasÂ»[8]; que un hombre es vivo: que Â«es como la luzÂ»[9]; para hablar de una mujer linda, Â«es como las estrellasÂ»; para indicar un caballo rÃ¡pido, Â«es como Ã¡guilaÂ»; para elogiar a un individuo firme que no cede a los embates de la mala fortuna, Â«es como cuadroÂ».[10] Cuando habla de su caballo le llama Â«mancarrÃ³nÂ»; a su mujer Â«la chinaÂ»[11]; a sus amigos Â«aparcerosÂ»; a los muchachos del campo, Â«charabonesÂ».

Verbs of causation in Spanish take the infinitive after them instead of the past participle that is found in similar cases in English.] [Note 205: =en adelante=, _thenceforth, from that time on_.] [Note 206: =llegar a ser=, _to be finally, to get to be_.] =ARABESCO= Oyendo hablar a un hombre, fÃ¡cil es Acertar dÃ³nde viÃ³ la luz del sol; Si os alaba a Inglaterra, serÃ¡ inglÃ©s, Si os habla mal de Prusia, es un francÃ©s, Y si habla mal de EspaÃ±a, es espaÃ±ol.
